Specifically designed for Mercedes Benz Sprinter & Ford Transit MK8 High Roof Vans, this durable net provides an effective barrier against mosquitoes, flies, and other unwanted critters. Enjoy your travels in peace and comfort, knowing you're protected from irritating bites and allergens.

This versatile insect screen is specifically designed to provide effective protection against pesky mosquitoes and flies in your Mercedes Benz Sprinter or Ford Transit MK8 high roof van.

  • Mesh material: Crafted from a fine, tightly woven mesh fabric that allows for optimal airflow while keeping insects at bay.
  • Easy installation and removal:
  • Securely attaches to your van's existing windows with strong magnets or clips, ensuring a snug and reliable fit. Designed for hassle-free installation and removal whenever you need it.

This insect screen is precisely engineered to fit the high roof of both Mercedes Benz Sprinter and Ford Transit MK8 vans. It is available in various sizes to perfectly match your specific window dimensions.

Enjoy a comfortable and pest-free driving experience with this premium insect screen.

  • Insect Protection: Say goodbye to bothersome mosquitoes and flies that can disrupt your journeys and make traveling unpleasant.
  • Improved Air Circulation:
  • The fine mesh allows for good ventilation, ensuring a fresh and comfortable atmosphere inside your van even with the screen in place.
  • Enhanced Hygiene
  • By preventing insects from entering your vehicle, this screen helps maintain a cleaner and more hygienic environment.

Installing this insect screen is simple and convenient. Simply attach it to your van's windows using the provided magnets or clips. When you don't need it, remove the screen for easy storage.

  • Camping trips
